```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
```

```{r}
macrophage <- readRDS(here('explore/RDS/macrophage_journal_replicaton2.RDS'))
```

```{r}
DimPlot(macrophage, group.by = "new_submain", label = T, repel = T)
ggsave(here("explore_figure/Macrophage_journal_replication/Dimplot_groupby_newsubmain.pdf"))

DimPlot(macrophage, group.by = "Diagnosis", label = T, repel = T)
ggsave(here("explore_figure/Macrophage_journal_replication/Dimplot_groupby_diagnosis.pdf"))

DimPlot(macrophage, group.by = "new_submain", label = F, repel = T, split.by = "Diagnosis")

```
